Public Member Functions

delegate void MapFloorToImagePercentCallback (int percentageComplete)
 MapViewer ()
void LoadMap ()
 Load the map into the picturebox at the currentZ level. Uses two level caching: the generated bitmap is saved as a png file in the map directory, and the Bitmap object is saved in memory.
Bitmap MapFloorToImage (string dir, int floor)
 Get an image of the entire map on the specified floor.

void Tibia.Util.MapViewer.LoadMap (  ) 

Load the map into the picturebox at the currentZ level. Uses two level caching: the generated bitmap is saved as a png file in the map directory, and the Bitmap object is saved in memory.
